Title: A Mixture of Madness
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Jonathan Tropper (teleplay by), Jonathan Tropper (story by), David Schickler (story by)
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Rabbit sends a hit squad after Lucas. He is saved by an unlikely ally. Lucas makes a decision that will have dramatic consequences on many people in Banshee. Job, Carrie, Sugar and the three deputies go after Lucas.
